# Third-Party Code Notices

This directory contains vendored third-party code used by diffgentor backends.
Only the minimal subset of files required for runtime inference is included.

## Vendored Projects

### step1x_edit (Step1X-Edit)
- **Source:** https://github.com/diffgentor/Step1X-Edit
- **License:** Apache-2.0 (see `step1x_edit/LICENSE`)
- **Used by:** `diffgentor.backends.editing.step1x`

### bagel (ByteDance BAGEL)
- **Source:** https://github.com/diffgentor/Bagel
- **License:** Apache-2.0 (see `bagel/LICENSE`)
- **Used by:** `diffgentor.backends.editing.bagel`

### emu35 (BAAI Emu3.5)
- **Source:** https://github.com/diffgentor/Emu3.5
- **License:** Apache-2.0 (see `emu35/LICENSE`)
- **Used by:** `diffgentor.backends.editing.emu35`

### dreamomni2 (DreamOmni2)
- **Source:** https://github.com/diffgentor/DreamOmni2
- **License:** Apache-2.0 (see `dreamomni2/LICENSE`)
- **Used by:** `diffgentor.backends.editing.dreamomni2`

### flux1 (BFL FLUX)
- **Source:** https://github.com/diffgentor/flux
- **License:** Apache-2.0 (see `flux1/LICENSE`)
- **Used by:** `diffgentor.backends.editing.flux_kontext`
